OTE: For the variable BKOTH, a code of 3 indicates that respondents did not originally answer "yes" to any of the questions about specific
offenses for which they were arrested/booked in the past 12 months, including the question about "some other offense."  However, these
respondents subsequently specified a valid response for an offense in the past 12 months. A code of 5 in BKOTH indicates that respondents
reported being arrested/booked at least once in the past 12 months but did not indicate at least one offense for which they were arrested in that
n the past 12 months, were you arrested and booked for some other offense besides these that have been named? Please do not include minor traffic
